contactUsDescription: For support, please contact us at support@ta3afi.app
emailDescription: We respond to all emails within 24 hours.
socialDescription: Follow us on social media for updates and support.
officeDescription: Drop by our office for a chat.
toastDesktopDescription: Ta'aafi is only available for iOS and Android.
heroDescription: Take control of your life and overcome porn addiction with our comprehensive recovery platform. Join thousands who've found freedom and built healthier habits.

termsContent.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
termsContent.content: By using Ta'aafi Platform, you agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use the app.

termsContent.title: 2. Use of the App
termsContent.content: You may use the app for personal, non-commercial purposes only. Do not misuse the app or engage in any activity that may harm the app or its users.

termsContent.title: 3. User Accounts
termsContent.content: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for all activities that occur under your account.

termsContent.title: 4. Content
termsContent.content: All content provided in the app is for informational purposes only. We are not responsible for any inaccuracies or errors.

termsContent.title: 5. Not a Medical Substitute
termsContent.content: This app is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any medical condition. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for medical concerns.

termsContent.title: 6. Privacy
termsContent.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect and use your data.

termsContent.title: 7. Modifications
termsContent.content: We may update these terms at any time. Continued use of the app after changes means you accept the new terms.

termsContent.title: 8. Contact Us
termsContent.content: For any questions, contact us at admin@ta3afi.app.

privacyContent.title: 1. Introduction
privacyContent.content: Welcome to Ta'aafi Platform. Your privacy is important to us, and this Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our app.

privacyContent.title: 2. Information We Collect
privacyContent.content:
We may collect the following types of information when you use Ta'aafi Platform:

Personal Information: Name, email address, and any other details you provide during account registration or usage.

Usage Data: Information about how you interact with the app, including pages visited, features used, and interactions with content.

Device Information: Data about the device you use, such as device model, operating system, and unique identifiers.

privacyContent.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
privacyContent.content:
We use the collected information to:

- Provide and improve the app's functionality and features.
- Respond to customer service inquiries and provide support.
- Analyze usage trends to enhance our services.

privacyContent.title: 4. Sharing Your Information
privacyContent.content: We do not share your personal information with any third parties.

privacyContent.title: 5. Data Security
privacyContent.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no data transmission over the internet or storage system can be guaranteed 100% secure.

privacyContent.title: 6. Your Rights
privacyContent.content:
You have the right to:

- Access, update, or delete your personal information by contacting us.
- Opt out of receiving promotional communications.
- Withdraw consent for data processing where applicable.

privacyContent.title: 7. Third-Party Links
privacyContent.content: The app may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of those third parties and encourage you to review their policies.

privacyContent.title: 8. Children's Privacy
privacyContent.content: Ta'aafi Platform is not intended for users under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If we become aware that we have collected data from a child, we will take steps to delete it.

privacyContent.title: 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy
privacyContent.content: We may update this policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted within the app, and continued use after updates constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.

privacyContent.title: 10. Contact Us
privacyContent.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: Email: admin@ta3afi.app

footerTagline: Simplifying complexity, one interface at a time.
statsDescription: Since launching Ta'aafi we've hit milestones we're proud of, and we're still working non-stop to give you the best experience.
blogStayUpdated: Stay updated with our latest insights, tutorials, and updates
introDescription1: Your recovery deserves more than willpower alone. Ta3afi equips you with science-backed digital tools that turn every urge resisted into a step forward.
introDescription2: Start building the life you want—one healthy habit, one honest moment, one day at a time.
trackerDescription: Log every victory—from a ten-second pause to a hundred-day streak—and watch your progress grow.
insightsDescription: Instant analytics reveal triggers, peak urge times, and patterns that keep you stuck—so you can break them.
calendarDescription: Schedule milestones, therapy sessions, and self-care checkpoints; review wins at a glance.
diariesDescription: A judgment-free space to record thoughts, emotions, and breakthroughs—encrypted and private.
activitiesDescription: Curated tasks and habit-building exercises keep your hands busy and your mind focused on growth.
libraryDescription: Expert-reviewed articles and videos guide you through cravings, relapse prevention, and long-term healing.
communityDescription: No one fights alone. Our global Community & Support network offers live group chats, themed challenges, and peer accountability so you can celebrate wins, share setbacks, and receive compassionate, science-based guidance whenever temptation strikes.
groupsDescription: Real-time group chat, shared challenges, and peer accountability to keep motivation high.
newToolsDescription: Personalized AI coaching, relapse-prediction alerts, and mood-tracking integrations—stay tuned!
progressDescription: Capture tiny triumphs and monumental milestones alike. The Tracker records every urge resisted while Insights transforms raw data into actionable clarity—revealing emotional triggers, time-of-day patterns, and hidden victories that boost confidence and sustain momentum.
planningDescription: View your journey at a glance. The Calendar renders streaks and daily follow-up notes as a vivid heat-map—tap any date to revisit urges resisted, reflections added, and moods logged—while Diaries remain your encrypted space to capture emotions in full color and nuance.
growthDescription: Banish boredom and fuel neuroplastic change. Bite-sized Activities strengthen willpower, while the Resource Library delivers expert-curated articles, videos, and exercises that rewire habits and keep motivation burning bright through every stage.
smartDescription: Get ready for a step-by-step Recovery Plan designed around YOU. This upcoming feature blends CBT techniques, habit-stacking exercises, and milestone celebrations into an adaptive roadmap that evolves with your triggers, schedule, and motivations—keeping clarity high and relapse risk low.
